dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, so, uh, they're saying a thirty-minute adjustment is like, too small to even matter? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, so, uh, they're saying a thirty-minute adjustment is like, too small to even matter? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that a minor adjustment of 30 minutes is unlikely to have a major impact, but shifting work schedules by 1-1.5 hours could significantly improve the city’s traffic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, but look, they're talking about shifting schedules by, like, a whole hour or even an hour and a half. That’s, you know, a different scale.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, but look, they're talking about shifting schedules by, like, a whole hour or even an hour and a half. That's, you know, a different scale.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He added that a minor adjustment of 30 minutes is unlikely to have a major impact, but shifting work schedules by 1-1.5 hours could significantly improve the city’s traffic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: An hour and a half. For traffic. Really? That's, um, that's their big solution in Astana? For real?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An hour and a half. For traffic. Really? That's, um, that's their big solution in Astana? For real?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It’s not just about traffic, A. It's about, you know, quality of life. Making things flow better for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just about traffic, A. It's about, you know, quality of life. Making things flow better for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, "flow better." Right. Like, we haven't heard that one before. Just reduce the working hours, come on, that's the obvious bit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, flow better. Right. Like, we haven't heard that one before. Just reduce the working hours, come on, that's the obvious bit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But Zeinulkabden, the Chairman, he specifically said reducing working hours won't solve the traffic problem. He’s pushing for adjustments instead.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But Zeinulkabden, the Chairman, he specifically said reducing working hours won't solve the traffic problem. He's pushing for adjustments instead.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking to journalists on the Mazhilis sidelines, Zeinulkabden ruled out a reduction in working time... "Simply reducing working hours won’t solve the traffic problem.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Adjustments. Like, some start earlier, some start later. Groundbreaking stuff. Truly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Adjustments. Like, some start earlier, some start later. Groundbreaking stuff. Truly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The eight-hour workday will remain, but some people may start earlier, while others may start later," he explained.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It could make a big difference, though! They even mention the East Kazakhstan region, where all eleven districts already switched to "their own time."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It could make a big difference, though! They even mention the East Kazakhstan region, where all eleven districts already switched to their own time.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: All 11 districts of the East Kazakhstan region have already switched to "their own time."

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Their own time." Sounds like, you know, an excuse to just… move the problem around, uh, without actually fixing anything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Their own time. Sounds like, you know, an excuse to just... move the problem around, uh, without actually fixing anything.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But it's working there, apparently! Two districts, Shemonaikha and Glubokoe, are starting at 8 AM now, specifically because of this.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's working there, apparently! Two districts, Shemonaikha and Glubokoe, are starting at eight A M now, specifically because of this.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starting March 13, employees of government institutions, enterprises, and social services in two districts of East Kazakhstan — Shemonaikha and Glubokoe — will begin work under a new schedule, starting at 8:00 AM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Eight AM. Wow. What was it before, like, midnight? I just don't see how moving a start time, uh, by an hour makes gridlock vanish.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Eight A M. Wow. What was it before, like, midnight? I just don't see how moving a start time, uh, by an hour makes gridlock vanish.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's about spreading out the peak load, A. Fewer cars on the road all at once. It's, like, basic logistics, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's about spreading out the peak load, A. Fewer cars on the road all at once. It's, like, basic logistics, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, you know, people just still leave at the same time anyway because of, like, school drop-offs or whatever. Life doesn't just, uh, shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, you know, people just still leave at the same time anyway because of, like, school drop-offs or whatever. Life doesn't just, uh, shift.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But if enough people shift, it will have an impact. The city's traffic, um, situation could really improve. That's the idea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But if enough people shift, it will have an impact. The city's traffic, um, situation could really improve. That's the idea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...shifting work schedules by 1-1.5 hours could significantly improve the city’s traffic situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. "Could." I'll believe it when I, you know, see it. Or don't see it, I guess, from my still-stuck-in-traffic car.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. Could. I'll believe it when I, you know, see it. Or don't see it, I guess, from my still-stuck-in-traffic car.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Come on, it's worth trying, right? A small change for potentially a big win for everyone.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Come on, it's worth trying, right? A small change for potentially a big win for everyone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Or, uh, a massive new headache for people trying to coordinate their lives. We'll see.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Or, uh, a massive new headache for people trying to coordinate their lives. We'll see.
